    • Method Detail

      • calculateIntersection

        int[] calculateIntersection(int[] coordinates,
                            int size,
                            int[] startPoint,
                            int distance)
        Method which allows to calculates closest intersection of lines in range of mouse current position
        Parameters:
        coordinates - take the mouse current position
        size - takes a size of board
        startPoint - takes a beging point of start drawing
        distance - takes a constant of distance between lines
        Returns:
        closest intersection

      • calculateStartPoint

        int[] calculateStartPoint(int height,
                          int size,
                          int distance)
        Method which allows to calculate where StartPoint of drawing should be
        Parameters:
        height - takes the height of drawing board
        size - takes the size of game board table
        Returns:
        start point in which drawing begins

      • calculateHeightandWidth

        int calculateHeightandWidth(int width,
                            int length)
        Method to calculate actuall height and width of drawing board
        Parameters:
        width - takes width from drawing board
        length - takes height from drawing board
        Returns:
        width and height

      • calculateTableIntersection

        int[][][] calculateTableIntersection(int[] startPoint,
                                     int distance,
                                     int boardSize,
                                     int criclesize)
        Method which generates a table of intersections of the lines on the DrawingBoard
        Parameters:
        startPoint - takes a start point where drawing begins
        distance - takes a constant distance between lines
        Returns:
        table of intersection of the lines

      • calculateDistance

        int calculateDistance(int height,
                      int boardSize)
        Method which sets the constant distance between lines
        Parameters:
        height - takes actuall height of the drawingboard
        boardSize - takes actuall size of drawingboard
        Returns:
        distance in which lines are drowed

      • calculateSizeOfCircle

        int calculateSizeOfCircle(int distance)
        Method that sets how large will be a filled cricle in the DrawingBoard
        Parameters:
        distance - takes distance to calculate size of circle
        Returns:
        size of filled circle
